tool_description: Detailed inside transactions for publicly listed companies. Includes SEC URLS to original documents. Updated every 30 seconds
name: Insiders
title: Insiders

api_list.name: gedetailedtinsiders
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://insiders.p.rapidapi.com/gedetailedtinsiders/BRK.A"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "insiders.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://insiders.p.rapidapi.com/gedetailedtinsiders/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "insiders.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
